name: Mara
appearance: Wind-chapped cheeks, braided cords wrapped around forearms, and a helm-cloak stitched with tiny slate fish. Her gaze is as sure as her stance on a wet deck.
character: Bold and duty-bound, her pride sits like a tiller hand—firm, guiding, sometimes unyielding.
talents: Sings in tune with the Chanting Ford’s tones
Ties knots that never slip under strain
dreams: Seat the Pilots on the Twelve Seals
Outmaneuver House Kelvar toll-chains at herd drives
secrets: Sold a chart scrap to the Night Orchard under duress
Keeps a forbidden reed-marker that points to a smuggler’s shoal
